associations_array.quote: First gain the victory and then make the best use of it you can.
associations_array.author: Horatio Nelson

associations_array.quote: A great many people think that polysyllables are a sign of intelligence.
associations_array.author: Barbara Walters

associations_array.quote: Fair peace becomes men ferocious anger belongs to beasts.
associations_array.author: Ovid

associations_array.quote: Well, marriage doesn't function in the way it used to in terms of deciding our fate, but it's in our heads, and it determines a lot of our actions. Like, right now, if you think about gay marriage - and they just started having the first gay marriages in New York - it shows what a potent idea marriage remains for people.
associations_array.author: Jeffrey Eugenides

associations_array.quote: Think of yourself as on the threshold of unparalleled success. A whole, clear, glorious life lies before you. Achieve! Achieve!
associations_array.author: Andrew Carnegie

associations_array.quote: I think that if we get back to some basic fundamental principles, we can make sure that we resolve the issues. And I think that that's what the Tea Party was all about. It's getting back to a constitutional conservative government. And that is limited, but it's also effective and efficient. I think that that's what we'll be able to do.
associations_array.author: Allen West

associations_array.quote: Power is the ability to get things done.
associations_array.author: Rosabeth Moss Kanter

associations_array.quote: All bad poetry springs from genuine feeling.
associations_array.author: Oscar Wilde

associations_array.quote: In strife who inquires whether stratagem or courage was used?
associations_array.author: Virgil

associations_array.quote: A politician is a man who understands government. A statesman is a politician who's been dead for 15 years.
associations_array.author: Harry S. Truman

associations_array.quote: Good buildings come from good people, ad all problems are solved by good design.
associations_array.author: Stephen Gardiner

associations_array.quote: Well, I always had a chauffer, because I have never driven a car in my life. I still can't drive.
associations_array.author: Bud Abbott

associations_array.quote: If by chance some day you're not feeling well and you should remember some silly thing I've said or done and it brings back a smile to your face or a chuckle to your heart, then my purpose as your clown has been fulfilled.
associations_array.author: Red Skelton

associations_array.quote: If love is the answer, could you please rephrase the question?
associations_array.author: Lily Tomlin

associations_array.quote: One of the most important things to remember about infant care is: don't change diapers in midstream.
associations_array.author: Don Marquis

associations_array.quote: Most of the time you're too busy to think about it. But every now and then you say, 'I work at 'Saturday Night Live,' and that is so cool.
associations_array.author: Tina Fey

associations_array.quote: When I turned 60, it didn't bother me at all.
associations_array.author: Yoko Ono

associations_array.quote: I keep dreaming of a future, a future with a long and healthy life, not lived in the shadow of cancer but in the light.
associations_array.author: Patrick Swayze

associations_array.quote: My mom introduced me to science-fiction.
associations_array.author: Logan Marshall-Green

associations_array.quote: It's just as hard... staying happily married as it is doing movies.
associations_array.author: Tom Hanks

associations_array.quote: The strongest influences in my life and my work are always whomever I love. Whomever I love and am with most of the time, or whomever I remember most vividly. I think that's true of everyone, don't you?
associations_array.author: Tennessee Williams

associations_array.quote: As a kid, I kind of spent my life being amazed by being tricked. I love being tricked. I still love it today.
associations_array.author: Daniel Craig

associations_array.quote: Truth is by nature self-evident. As soon as you remove the cobwebs of ignorance that surround it, it shines clear.
associations_array.author: Mahatma Gandhi

associations_array.quote: Taste as you go. When you taste the food throughout the cooking process you can make adjustments as you go.
associations_array.author: Anne Burrell

associations_array.quote: Working with plants, trees, fences and walls, if they practice sincerely they will attain enlightenment.
associations_array.author: Dogen Zenji

associations_array.quote: The best situation is where they cast you and then they trust you.
associations_array.author: Illeana Douglas

associations_array.quote: Old age is a shipwreck.
associations_array.author: Charles de Gaulle

associations_array.quote: A primary function of art and thought is to liberate the individual from the tyranny of his culture in the environmental sense and to permit him to stand beyond it in an autonomy of perception and judgment.
associations_array.author: Beverly Sills

associations_array.quote: Success is blocked by concentrating on it and planning for it... Success is shy - it won't come out while you're watching.
associations_array.author: Tennessee Williams

associations_array.quote: That's always a cool thing to be the voice of what the eyes are seeing. It gives you the role of the Greek chorus and that's always fun to do.
associations_array.author: Jorge Garcia

associations_array.quote: Listen, I have a great affection and respect for Joe Biden. I think he's been a great vice president. He's taken on a lot of tough assignments for our administration.
associations_array.author: David Axelrod

associations_array.quote: Imagine a judicial nominee said 'my experience as a white man makes me better than a Latina woman.' Wouldn't they have to withdraw? New racism is no better than old racism.
associations_array.author: Newt Gingrich

associations_array.quote: I believe that anyone can conquer fear by doing the things he fears to do, provided he keeps doing them until he gets a record of successful experience behind him.
associations_array.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

associations_array.quote: To bare our souls is all we ask, to give all we have to life and the beings surrounding us. Here the nature spirits are intense and we appreciate them, make offerings to them - these nature spirits who call us here - sealing our fate with each other, celebrating our love.
associations_array.author: Alex Grey

associations_array.quote: You're asking the wrong girl about fame. I'm hardly famous. I wouldn't want to trade places with anyone else.
associations_array.author: Nikki Cox

associations_array.quote: I am a sportsman and not a politician. I am a sportsman and will always remain one. I am not going to enter politics giving up cricket, which is my life. I will continue to play cricket.
associations_array.author: Sachin Tendulkar

associations_array.quote: Books are the legacies that a great genius leaves to mankind, which are delivered down from generation to generation as presents to the posterity of those who are yet unborn.
associations_array.author: Joseph Addison

associations_array.quote: Sometimes people offer you plays, they offer you parts, but they only offer it because I'm famous.
associations_array.author: Chris Rock

associations_array.quote: It's nice to be with someone, but I don't think you need to be in a relationship to feel complete. That would be really sad.
associations_array.author: Kristin Davis

associations_array.quote: We tried to approach this as though there's never been a Superman movie before, but at the same time respecting the canon and mythology. There are the pillars that you have to respect, and I'm not about to break them. But it is fun for me to bend them and mess with them.
associations_array.author: Zack Snyder

associations_array.quote: I did not direct my life. I didn't design it. I never made decisions. Things always came up and made them for me. That's what life is.
associations_array.author: B. F. Skinner

associations_array.quote: Obstacles are things a person sees when he takes his eyes off his goal.
associations_array.author: E. Joseph Cossman

associations_array.quote: I love every second of being a mom.
associations_array.author: Lily Aldridge

associations_array.quote: This is the highest wisdom that I own freedom and life are earned by those alone who conquer them each day anew.
associations_array.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

associations_array.quote: Abstract Expressionism - the first American movement to have a worldwide influence - was remarkably short-lived: It heated up after World War II and was all but done for by 1960 (although visit any art school today and you'll find a would-be Willem de Kooning).
associations_array.author: Jerry Saltz

associations_array.quote: Hope is tomorrow's veneer over today's disappointment.
associations_array.author: Evan Esar

associations_array.quote: I had to choose, I'd be so sad. They are flip sides of the same coin. I love both comedy and drama.
associations_array.author: Dianne Wiest

associations_array.quote: A city building, you experience when you walk a suburban building, you experience when you drive.
associations_array.author: Helmut Jahn

associations_array.quote: It's a positive thing to talk about terrible things and make people laugh about them.
associations_array.author: Louis C. K.

associations_array.quote: Each particular society begins to feel its strength, whence arises a state of war between different nations.
associations_array.author: Charles de Secondat

associations_array.quote: He best keeps from anger who remembers that God is always looking upon him.
associations_array.author: B. C. Forbes

associations_array.quote: Till now I have never shot a scene without taking account of what stands behind the actors because the relationship between people and their surroundings is of prime importance.

associations_array.quote: I've always had an interest in sports across the board.
associations_array.author: Gabrielle Union

associations_array.quote: We want deeper sincerity of motive, a greater courage in speech and earnestness in action.
associations_array.author: Sarojini Naidu

associations_array.quote: My mom is very Southern and she in real life says things like, 'If you've got it, flaunt it.'
associations_array.author: Cheryl Hines

associations_array.quote: I think clothes should make you feel safe. I like clothes you want to go to sleep in. I sometimes stand in front of a mirror and change a million times because I know I really want to wear my nightgown.
associations_array.author: Gilda Radner

associations_array.quote: Life loves to be taken by the lapel and told: 'I'm with you kid. Let's go.'
associations_array.author: Maya Angelou

associations_array.quote: Anything I've ever said, I certainly was feeling at the time.
associations_array.author: Eminem

associations_array.quote: I've always loved the experience of working together with other people toward an artistic goal.
associations_array.author: Trey Anastasio

associations_array.quote: I think that people are tired. They're tired of the same old kind of politics. People want a new tone to politics.

associations_array.quote: My leadership will end the Obama era and begin a new era of American prosperity.

associations_array.author: Gro Harlem Brundtland

associations_array.quote: One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation.
associations_array.author: Arthur Ashe

associations_array.quote: The questions which one asks oneself begin, at least, to illuminate the world, and become one's key to the experience of others.
associations_array.author: James A. Baldwin

associations_array.quote: Five years ago we were working on a new album when my health began failing.
associations_array.author: Lou Gramm

associations_array.quote: Obviously there's not much options when you're a cartoonist - you pretty much either work at home or rent an office I guess, and working at home just seems easier.
associations_array.author: Scott Adams

associations_array.quote: The wise are wise only because they love. The fool are fools only because they think they can understand love.
associations_array.author: Paulo Coelho

associations_array.quote: I was taught that to create anything you had to believe in failure, simply because you had to be prepared to go through an idea without any fear. associations_array.author: Malcolm Mclaren

associations_array.quote: It is better we disintegrate in peace and not in pieces.
associations_array.author: Nnamdi Azikiwe

associations_array.quote: The roughest part of that lifestyle is the travel and early mornings.
associations_array.author: Josie Maran

associations_array.quote: Both my mum and dad were great readers, and we would go every Saturday morning to the library, and my sister and I had a library card when we could pass off something as a signature, and all of us would come with an armful of books.
associations_array.author: Geraldine Brooks

associations_array.quote: I love being around my friends and my family and spending time with my husband. I like being normal and recharging my batteries, and I feel like I have the coolest job in the world where I get to get on stage and perform and get to do a lot of really amazing things.
associations_array.author: Carrie Underwood

associations_array.quote: Whosoever is delighted in solitude is either a wild beast or a god.
associations_array.author: Aristotle

associations_array.quote: I am not a sexy woman, I'm not beautiful, I'm not a sex kitten, I don't flirt with people, yet I've been tagged more of sex symbol than women who truly are and I that's solely because I don't reveal too much: people are curious.
associations_array.author: Shirley Manson

associations_array.quote: I envy the happiness of others... I envy the sense of belonging... I seem always to be remaking myself.
associations_array.author: Richard Eyre

associations_array.quote: It would be unwise to say the least, irresponsible of us at the TSA, at the Homeland Security Department not to evolve our technology to match the changing threat environment that we inhabit.
associations_array.author: Janet Napolitano

associations_array.quote: It may be hard for an egg to turn into a bird: it would be a jolly sight harder for it to learn to fly while remaining an egg. We are like eggs at present. And you cannot go on indefinitely being just an ordinary, decent egg. We must be hatched or go bad.
associations_array.author: C. S. Lewis

associations_array.quote: Our marriage is between us. If we decide to continue being together or not, it's our business.
associations_array.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

associations_array.quote: I think it's good for sports cars to be united, to be just one. I think it's good for the fans. When you have two different series, fans don't know which way to go, when you only have one I think it's good for the sport.
associations_array.author: Juan Pablo Montoya

associations_array.quote: Practically everyone in Hollywood has a neighbor who's been famous, wants to be famous, is famous, has been married to someone famous, worked with someone famous, slept with someone famous, been blackmailed by someone famous.
associations_array.author: Jennifer Grey

associations_array.quote: Hollywood is a cross between a health farm, a recreation center and an insane asylum. It's a company town, and I happen to like the company!
associations_array.author: Michael Caine

associations_array.quote: The wise man should restrain his senses like the crane and accomplish his purpose with due knowledge of his place, time and ability.
associations_array.author: Chanakya

associations_array.quote: The job of buildings is to improve human relations: architecture must ease them, not make them worse.
associations_array.author: Ralph Erskine

associations_array.quote: We had great faith that with patience, understanding, and education, that my family and I could be helpful in changing their minds and attitudes around.
associations_array.author: Ryan White

associations_array.quote: No man is happy without a delusion of some kind. Delusions are as necessary to our happiness as realities.
associations_array.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

associations_array.quote: If you have learned how to disagree without being disagreeable, then you have discovered the secrete of getting along - whether it be business, family relations, or life itself.
associations_array.author: Bernard Meltzer

associations_array.quote: I remember when I was 6 years old and my brother used to go seek out guys that were 13 to come over and play football against me while he was the 'permanent quarterback.' I didn't know exactly what the age difference was, but I was already playing against older guys.
associations_array.author: Junior Seau

associations_array.quote: I used to think that everything was just being funny but now I don't know. I mean, how can you tell?
associations_array.author: Andy Warhol

associations_array.quote: Lord, grant that I might not so much seek to be loved as to love.
associations_array.author: Francis of Assisi

associations_array.quote: I believe that, like most writers, my personality comes through in the fiction. So in that respect my writing can't be like any other author's really.
associations_array.author: Paul Kane

associations_array.quote: The best physicians are Dr. Diet, Dr. Quiet, and Dr. Merryman.
associations_array.author: Daniel D. Palmer

associations_array.quote: Aging has a wonderful beauty and we should have respect for that.
associations_array.author: Eartha Kitt

associations_array.quote: If you love dance and you have the gift of teaching, teaching is super amazing and important because my teachers planted that seed in me. As a teacher you understand the difference or the definition of a Baryshnikov or a Gregory Hines, so teaching is really important and very necessary.
associations_array.author: Laurieann Gibson

associations_array.quote: I don't wait for moods. You accomplish nothing if you do that. Your mind must know it has got to get down to work.
associations_array.author: Pearl S. Buck

associations_array.quote: God is cruel. Sometimes he makes you live.
associations_array.author: Stephen King

associations_array.quote: I am not a sad clown. I am not a sad clown.
associations_array.author: Nathan Lane

associations_array.quote: I'm done with men... I'm going to be alone. I have no luck with relationships. I don't think I'm made for marriage.
associations_array.author: Halle Berry

associations_array.quote: Our strength is not just in the size of our defense budget, but in the size of our hearts, in the size of our gratitude for their sacrifice. And that's not just measured in words or gestures.
associations_array.author: Jennifer M. Granholm

associations_array.quote: I don't need to be wildly famous for my life to make sense.
associations_array.author: Cory Monteith

associations_array.quote: If you're going to put yourself above everybody else, you might end up alone.
associations_array.author: Joseph Gordon-Levitt
